transform_def.name: variant1
transform_def.string: let rotmat = mat2x2(cos(rotate), -sin(rotate), sin(rotate), cos(rotate)) d = length(p_in) r = weight * (unit_rnd_0 - holes) * ecc / (d + ecc * p_in.x) conic_out = p_in * r p = rotmat * conic_out fx = tanh(p_in.x * p.x) + sinh(p_in.y * p.y) fy = sinh(p_in.y * p.x) - tanh(p_in.x * p.y) fr = weight * (p.x * p.x + p.y * p.y) in vec2(fx, fy) * fr
